templateOptions.label: Correlate only
templateOptions.description: When toggled, this connector will only correlate to an existing account and skip all further account lifecycle actions.

templateOptions.label: Only set phone authentication method 'mobile' when empty
templateOptions.description: When toggled, the phone authentication method 'mobile' will only be updated when currently empty and will not overwrite existing data.

templateOptions.label: Delete phone authentication method 'mobile' when revoking the entitlement
templateOptions.description: When toggled, the phone authentication method 'mobile' will be deleted when revoking the entitlement.

templateOptions.label: Only set phone authentication method 'alternate mobile' when empty
templateOptions.description: When toggled, the phone authentication method 'alternate mobile' will only be updated when currently empty and will not overwrite existing data.

templateOptions.label: Delete phone authentication method 'alternate mobile' when revoking the entitlement
templateOptions.description: When toggled, the phone authentication method 'alternate mobile' will be deleted when revoking the entitlement.

templateOptions.label: Only set phone authentication method 'office' when empty
templateOptions.description: When toggled, the phone authentication method 'office' will only be updated when currently empty and will not overwrite existing data.

templateOptions.label: Delete phone authentication method 'office' when revoking the entitlement
templateOptions.description: When toggled, the phone authentication method 'office' will be deleted when revoking the entitlement.

templateOptions.label: Toggle debug logging
templateOptions.description: When toggled, debug logging will be displayed
